section.p: If you call this method to switch user roles after joining the channel, after the call is successful, the callback will be triggered locally; the remote side will trigger or (USER_OFFLINE_BECOME_AUDIENCE) callback. If you call this method to switch user roles after joining the channel, after the call is successful, the callback will be triggered locally; the remote side will trigger or (USER_OFFLINE_BECOME_AUDIENCE) callback.
section.note: This method applies only to interactive live streaming. This method applies only to interactive live streaming.
